reviews.review_text: Brian is the MAN!!!!! The service is out of this world! Super friendly and knows the menu inside and out. This was our first time here so we didnt know what to order, Brian spend his time with us and was very patient. Was he ever was right about the suggestions, the best seafood I ever had, did I mention they would come by and take the empties right away and refill everything right away. Had a blast of the night, will be back super soon. 10 stars, thank you Brian.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Celebrated a birthday and wanted a whole lobster. So we ordered the Pirates Feast. Oh boy, what a feast! The Captains Boil sauce is soooo finger-licking good (a tad too salty but still yummy nonetheless) and all the seafood we selected were fresh and cooked just nice. Besides the corn being too soggy to our liking, everything else was on point. Obviously the two of us could only manage half of the feast and had to pack the rest home. Its our first time here and we were guided by the nice servers how to order. Will be back for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: Very tasty food, as soon as you enter the cafe you immediately feel the aroma of delicious food! We were there for the first time, we were recommended by friends. I havent eaten such delicious food at a reasonable price for a long time. Thank you guys for a great evening, high-quality service and care. We were lucky and the team took care of us)) Brian, Alexandra, Evan and Nicholas, thank you for the evening, you are super!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: My experience there was amazing. When i entered, i got seated quickly. I am amazed by the customer service. The staff there were very kind and patient. I was there as a hangout with family and everyone enjoyed their food. My favourite dishes there has to be the fried rice and chicken wings. The portion sizes for the price were very reasonable and pretty good. 10/10 would recommend to everyone and will definitely go again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a positive experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: It was good experience to get together with your friends and eat here in lunch time.food is fresh and warm to serve. There is no plastic bib now but they still have plastic gloves. We celebrate my Birthday here and the service is good,they let us barrow a plate for a cake that we bring it there. We are 8 people dine in here and tell me I need to pay additional 15% gratitude as we have exceed people to sit in,which is understandable. Over all we defineitly come back here agakn Parking: Parking is in the sidewalk with pay or back parking which is limited but free.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: The place is small but the important part is the food! I met a friend there and we both were satisfied with the service and the food. I wish there were drinks like lemonade or mocktails. We were satisfied and will go back with my family.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your feedback and will take it into consideration as we continuously strive to enhance our offerings and ensure better value for our customers. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Had a blast, definitely worth the experience. Heard about it on ads for the longest time then finally made it there last night. A little overpriced but everything was absolutely delicious and so much fun eating with your hands and just throwing it on the table. Everyone should experience this at least once, but we will be back!

I love the Cajun spiced mussels! So big and juicey. You come to this place for the fun experience and yummy food. I love the seafood fried rice! The staff was amazing and I would definitely go back. This is not an experience for someone who doesnt like to get a bit messy!

Try this captain s boil in kingsway ,service crew is nice   , i recommend to get the PIRATE, its worth 129 dollars with lobster, i think but we did not try it you add 15 dollars and get king crab feet its also good for 5-6 person. Maybe will try that next time   .

INCREDIBLE!! Fresh, plentiful Seafood! Very good prices! This location is just as good as the Richmond one. Food came right away. Great service! Can t wait to come back! Make sure you get the Captain s Boil sauce on everything!!

Me and my family went there for lunch and it was splendid. The staff were so nice and the food was great! The place felt really lively and it was a delightful experience. I will definitely come back soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Id never been to a Captains Boil before but I will definitely go again! I loved it. Crazy messy, very important to wear the gloves and bib provided   Our waitress was delightful and very helpful in explaining how the food was presented, (in a boiled bag!), and how to eat it, (just use the table). She checked back regularly but not so often we couldnt enjoy a conversation. I cant wait to go back and try a different bag - o - boiled seafood.
Love this place. Definitely dont suggest wearing white but they got bibs. I love eating with my hands. Only thing I would change is maybe an option for smaller gloves for the kids
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Relatively new Western style seafood place. Unlike some popular names in tourist destinations which usually taste awful and overpriced, the food here is actually tasty. Got the combo which wasnt cheap but worth a try. Would go again.

Took my family for a nice seafood dinner.  This was beyond my expectation; staff are friendly, the restaurant is clean. The food was amazing!! The portions are BIG, the flavor is spectacular.  Loved the lobster, mussels, shrimp, veggies, rice, chicken, fries. The energy was fun - music playing, guests enjoying their food. After we finished our seafood feast we were already planning our next visit. Definitely going back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: This restaurant is Amazing!! First time I ever ate a this type of eatery and will definitely go back. Fresh seafood right off the table getting messy and sucking up prawn brains. Good porting, selection and great flavours. N.B. Dont wear your Sunday clothes.
Went before the rush, staff was a little slow on certain things but overall the food was really good. Kind of expensive, but it is seafood.

First time there and we LOVED it!!  The Captains Boil blend of flavors was delicious.  We got a seafood fried rice and ordered a second, it was so good!  Definitely left with insanely full, happy bellies!!

Incredible is the simple way to describe it. Delicious, incredible portions, mouthwatering flavors. A liter of beer? What more can you ask for? We got shrimp (more like jumbo prawn) with Captains boil sauce, and another order with Cajun sauce. One came with potato and sausage, the other with potato and corn. Also an extra side order of fries. It was the perfect feast, and Ill definitely be back!
I love this place, the experience and itself is so unique. Its definitely expensive and a seafood isnt the freshest but its really good, the sauces are lovely and the dungeness and shrimp are local
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a positive experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Real nice place to have party with friends! Thank to Evan for great service! My next party with friends gonna to be here! Highly recommended! Food : 5/5 |
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will address it with the team to ensure a better experience in the future. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the food.  We had the garlic flavoring and everything was delicious.  The fish was super crispy and the fries were amazing hot.  We would definitely come back again.

Captain Boil is a big franchise seafood restaurant. It has more than 30 restaurants across Canada in different cities. There are five locations in the Great Vancouver area. I have been to the two locations before: one is on Robson St. Downtown and another one is on Kingsway Vancouver. Both of the locations served quite delicious seafood. Very enjoy eating at Captain Boil. Captain Boil Kingsway Location is at 3309 Kingsway, Vancouver, BC V5R 5K6. The same as Robson St. location, is a super busy street in Vancouver. Many restaurants are on the street. Such a great location to open a restaurant on this street. I have been to this location twice with my friends and fiances. The first time was all you can eat Mussels night. The second time was lunch combo. For all you can eat Mussels dinner, three of us had 2lbs mussels each plus fries. It was awesome. The big plastics bags were full of fresh seafood. Yummy! Captain Boil s Lunch combo is another great combination. Fish or Chicken Teriyaki with rice with Seafood Assortments (2 Crawfish, 2 Mussels, 2 Shrimps, and 2 Clams). The total is only $13, which is such a great deal. Super hot rice with teriyaki sauce on top is super delicious. Definitely, we should go back to Captain Boil again.
Fish and chips are really good, paired with spicy cajun fries. The dungeness crab is pricey but portion is big. Choose the captains boil sauce.
Had a real good time with family Default seasoning is great Excellent lobster and dungeoness crab Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving us a review. We appreciate your feedback and will address it with the team to ensure a better experience in the future. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

reviews.review_text: First time eatting at Captains Boil, with 2 others. We ordered Captains platter #3 (cant remember the name, because I wasnt the one paying the bill!), 2 lbs of crayfish, okra, fish & chips, and platter comes with Cajun seafood fried rice. Each protein with different sauces. Everything is delicious, even the Cajun fries!! I like the garlic sauce the best. THE CAJUN SEAFOOD FRIED RICE have SCALLOPS too and not mentioned on the menu!!!! The scallops were not added to the fried rice after telling our server about fatal allergy to scallops, so everyone can eat enjoy the fried rice drizzled with the yummy sauces. Will definitely eat at Captains Boil again!!!

Ill certainly come back, not too many options for kids though. Delicious prawns served in a very unique and messy way - do not come here with nice clothes on or for a first date, you will leave covered in sauce
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: First time at this restaurant and loved it. Different kind of dining experience,  where your food comes in a bag cooked and you have to eat with your hands. Food was awesome. Service was prompt and delightful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Some special style seafood! If you are not too specific or picky about your sauce, their Captains boil sauce is recommended.
Awesome dinning experience, great food and friendly and helpful staff. Will certainly revisit.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Although it s a bit pricey the food never disappoints. I ve yet to try the all you can eat because the different crab options are too good to pass but I shall try it one day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: My family and I are always going to this location for a special occasion or if we are craving for some good seafood! We always order pounds of shrimp, the captain boil fried rice, and the Cajun fries. Great place to share seafood and eat with your hands with family and friends :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Really good food. Not too happy about using so much plastic though
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We apologize for any disappointment you may have encountered during your recent visit. We are diligently working on an alternative solution to replace plastic bags, aiming to provide an improved experience. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.

reviews.review_text: The captains boil was so fun and had a cool vibe. They gave us gloves and had the most useful sizzers so you didnt have to work super hard for your crab. The captains choice seasoning was really good.  I also would have really liked to try the garlic. This is the first place we have eaten in Vancouver and they set the standard way high.  Also thanks for all of the recomendations.
Best seafood ever!! I love eating there and get messy   haven t been there for a while because it s quite expensive but it s worth it.
Food was out to us quickly,  great service.  Loved the lights and rest of the decor
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: The food was so awesome and the staff afe so friendly. Be back again
The captains boil in kingsway is the way to go they have their own specials
My favorite place for seafood. Been going for few years and never had a problem with my food or service.
Absolutely love this place from customer service to food fantastic. The various options they have and talk about the best seafood I have ever had. Amazing delicious cant wait to return.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Spending a great meal with my fiance, it was a blessing The food was so amazing and filling. The service was excellent Con: The bathroom was small.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: AMAZING experience thank you so much Brian and the team what a grenat experience. Dave and Marie eve from Montreal
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: First time here, great food, cooked perfectly, interesting way to eat.

What is not to love about fresh seafood.! I drive from surrey to come here. The food is always steaming hot. The servers are very sweet. I always get mild because got is really spicy but mild lets you enjoy the flavours. I really missed this place during the pandemic and Im happy they still stayed in business!
Very cool and romantic.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great place to eat seafood. Reasonable prices and very nice staff!

Unique dine in experience compared to most of the local restaurants, great hospitality, good portions, variety of options to pick from. They also have customer parking at the rear which is a plus on a busy evening, which is usually the case. I would recommend this place to anyone who hasnt tried it yet.
Awesome place to dine with family. Wonderful food and service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Angelo, Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: Best sea food in Vancouver! Always love bringmy friends and family over for a nice feast! Love the shrimp fired rice, dont you dare to get rid of it! Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: That was a great place to have some seafood and drinks!

I love the different experience to eat directly from a bag full of amazing and yummy options. The price is good and the shrimp is really delicious. The idea of the cool bib is incredible. When I said that my meal was too spicy - even asking no spice - they gave me another one, promptly. Moms Day - it was really crowded but worth it.
Was very good everything tasted great and the staff was great too definitely will be back again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience at The Captains Boil. We are so pleased to hear you found your experience your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: You couldnt go wrong with this place. Tasty, good serving size and a good price. Very friendly and polite staff. I love seafood, I can be here every weekend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the kind words. We look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: A must see in Vancouver! Great food, service n vibe!

So much fun to eat with your hands! Great flavors, and excellent lunch prices of you prefer before 4pm. The only recommendation I have is to dim the lights slightly after 6pm. Best for well suited couples and NOT A FIRST DATE   SO MESSY! and so much fun.
I m seafood lover, Alaskan king crab was the best crab ever I had, the cajun flavour was so good, for sure will come back. Their portions are very generous.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karwan, that s wonderful to hear. Thanks so much for leaving us a review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great food & service!  Highly recommend!  Our group went for the share platter option. (Pirates Feast) Good value and very tasty!  With the 3 lbs of shrimp you can ask for 3 different flavors for each 1 lb.  (Captains Boil flavor was my fav)
One of my all time favorite places to have crab.  Its messy and unconventional but oh so delicious!!

Sooo delicious! Just went for the first time, ordered king crab legs with captains boil seasoning & medium heat with sausage and corn as sides. Also ordered Cajun fries and 1 lobster tail (not yet on the menu, but available if you ask) We are super impressed and will be back again soon :)
Great flavor, fun  to  eat,  many options, great packages  and good  beer! Sometimes  waiting time can be long , other  than that is  great  :) Wish their  spicy option was really spicy... Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the positive feedback. It means a lot. See you next time!

reviews.review_text: Yamyamyam I want to go there soon! The fried rice is my favorite.

Great experience! We were seated quickly on a Thursday evening. Server was polite and friendly and the food we ordered took under 10 minutes to get to our table after ordering. You are given a plastic bib and gloves to start and everything is brought fresh.
My family loves the food here. Our go-to dishes on special occasions are the snow crab, shrimp fried rice and shrimp basket.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Been here twice now both times was good. Got the gold and planium set dinner. Crab had firm and sweet tasting so I know it is fresh, not the frozen ones. Other items like the snow crab, clam, and shrimp are good as well. Only complain was all four sauces has some spice so unless your kids can take a tiny/mild spice, they wont like it much. My kid like the flavour but cant take the slight heat.
Food is absolutely delicious, but they really need to get the air vent/ AC upgraded. Every guest seated for dine in was sweating buckets.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the review. Thanks for taking the time. Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: This is a great place if you are really wanting some good ole fashioned seafood in a truly maritime fashion.  Be prepared to get your hands dirty.  The food was great if not a little salty but it was fun.  Everything you order comes out in plastic bags and is just plopped down in front of you.  You have plastic gloves on so that you can minimize the amount of sauce that you get on your hands.  The only thing that I might be concerned about is the large amount of plastic bags that they go through before every group.  Definitely not an environmental friendly place. Maybe they use bags that are biodegradable.  If they do, they should really market that better.
Service was good and fast. Will def come back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: This place is now my favorite restaurant Im gonna come here on my birthday on my girlfriends birthday and Im bringing my grandma here on her birthday cause the service is amazing and the food is so good, My favorite part of all those you eat with your hands and that makes you feel like a kid a gun great for children and just a fun meal highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for taking time out of your day to review us. Hope you have an amazing day!

reviews.review_text: was so good... staff were friendly.... food was served fast. we had one of the FEASTS and it was so much food for 2 people but made for great bed snacks later :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad you had a great experience, Tyler. Have a wonderful day!

reviews.review_text: Really tasty unique food. Just be prepared to make a mess and be advised its quite expensive. Bring an appetite.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your five-star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us at The Captains Boil. We hope you ll visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: The restaurant was amazing. We came there last week and ordered various seafood, fry and oyster. food was so tasty and especially their Dungeness crab was awesome. fresh and a lot of meat. Fresh seafood, tasty sauce, cheerful servers. for sure I will go again with my family!
Amazing food Great prices Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us. We are delighted to know that you had a great experience with us. Look forward to your future visit!

reviews.review_text: Very interesting place to experience something different with various seafood. They are way more organized with decent service than before and we did not have to wait for a table no longer than 20min. They do take reservations, and they know what they are doing.  : ) I would definitely come back again.  Good job, crew!

Theres this place in California called Boiling Crab where waiting times are often 45+ minutes. At the time, when I used to live around the area for several years, my family and I thought the food was legendary and we would eat there at least once a month. However, when my family and I moved to Canada and discovered this place, we were blown away at how much more delicious the food was. When we vacationed at California and tried out the Boiling Crab restaurant, there was a sharp difference in quality. Captains Boil truly is amazing. Their food is beyond legendary.

The best place to get down & dirty with your food!  Had so much fun & the food was awesome. Its definitely a great place to go with friends & enjoy seafood that is fresh & very tasty. We loved it & well be back soon!

Strongly suggest to try their fried rice and seafood. It feels relax I can grab the food by hand and eat without any cutlery. The spicy level is really mild, so the spicy lover prob need to ask making the food extra extra spicy

The location is very easy to find, its between Joyce & Kingsway. The prices are considered cheap compare to other seafood restaurants. Orders comes in lbs and I say a pound of shrimps is good for two people sharing as their servings are quite large. And also, the sauce is more spicy than expected. You should try the captains boil sauce, its superb!   And lastly, make sure to make reservations, theres a crowd!

Amazing service, very attentive and charming. Food was amazing, and the customizations are endless. Portion size is generous and the sauces are delicious ; not to mention that th seafood is fresh and tasty. The experience is worth the cost. Would definitely come again.

Definitely one of my new favourite places! Fresh and extremely tasty food, very friendly and helpful staff, great prices, fun atmosphere and decor, good for large groups or small intimate meals. If youve never been, theres no cutlery or dishware, food arrives bagged and everything is an amazing hands on experience. They provide bibs and gloves if youre concerned about splatters etc, and snips and claw crackers to break open the legs and claws. The Captains Boil flavour is the best, and omg the Cajun fries. Havent had a Dungeness crab in years, but I devoured every tasty morsel with a huge grin on my face, wrist deep in sauce, and licking them clean every chance I got. Definitely worth a try if youve never been and love seafood!

Came here for the annual ayce shrimp with the family. Service was great, our server suggested items suitable for the kids and she modified them to be non spicy. There were a lot of options to choose from and our server took her time to get everything right.

Good experience to eat . Our first time and we like the food. Messy when we grind but we are the warriors doesnt matter. . Lil bit hight pricey  but I dont if I got a discount when I come back . 5 start for me for my first time.
Tastey seafood, superb menu and fantastic friendly staff. Highly recommend    Keep up the good work and  hope to see  more  the Captains Boil restaurants. Surrey would love a yummy addition
I visited to buy 2boils event, but it was only used for store meals, so I bought the basic menu and picked it up. It was good and I think Ill use it again next time
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to learn your experience was a positive one. See you next time!

reviews.review_text: As it was Eid yesterday, i wanted try some sea food. Hence, ordered Mix and Match from Ubereats. It was amazing. The gravy in this dish was awesome and spice level was up to the mark.

Was our first time eating at The Captains Boil and it was so good! The service was pretty good and the food was bomb. One of our new favorite places... Just make sure you wash up before you leave lol I walked around the grocery store after with sauce all over my face after.

Sea foods at its best. Eating the king crabs,  shrimps and squid with your hands makes it more comfy and tastier. But you are provided with an apron and plastic gloves in order not to smell after. We went to Kingsway branch and service and food was great!
Decent prices and good food. Dont come wearing fancy clothes and be prepared to make a mess
The food is beyond amazing.. absolutely delicious and I totally recommend this place
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Foods delicious and service is awesome

Totally amazing assault on your taste buds. Very clever unforgettable food presentation which is unique and the sauces adapted to suit your taste and mood. Ideal for sharing. Sincerely hope to be back one day.

Incredible seafood, always tastes fresh, and the prices are very good. Its the excellent sauces, and the atmosphere, great visual style, and novel, messy, eat with your hands experience that really make it special though.

Amazingly delicious seafood thats fresh and well seasoned. We had the Dungeness crab at market price, which I thought was expensive but it was definitely worth it, was at least 2 lbs as described and it was a super meaty and delicious crab!

Their shrimp is probably my favorite food in the world. Lots of garlic, so much shrimp meat. Order a cup of rice, squeeze some lime on it, put lots of the sauce they season the shrimp with, and eat away. You will not regret it. Its a bit expensive but...
Seafood lovers rejoice. This is the place you want to be. The place is packed during dining hours. Reserve in advance for a big group. Be prepared to use your hands. Parking is a challenge as well.

Gloriously messy. The tables are covered in butcher paper, you eat with plastic gloves and a bib, and theres a dedicated sink by the front desk for patrons to wash up after dinner. Recommended for first dates and business meetings, to weed out the overly-dainty.

The best seafood that I ever taste in my lifespan! This place is awesome with very eficient and kind service all the time. It fills all your expectations and you will completly in love of this restaurant!
Tasty seafood with the unforgettable sauce(the captain s boil) !
Had a wonderful experience there with food and environment. The staff is very quick. The food is so unbelievably good . I will surly go there again and suggest everyone to give it a visit.
Amazing! We were here for my father in laws birthday and well definitely be coming back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable dining experience.

reviews.review_text: Awesome food!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to learn your experience was a positive one. Hope you have an amazing day!
